txt.en: You have received an order to fill a delivery to a member of the Inn League who has been stranded away from the festival this season.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>

'I have here a list of requests to assist Inn League members in need, stranded away from home without the support of their beer-loving brethren. It seems they miss their favourite drinks, or in some cases they've never even tasted them!

'Take Lendasil, for example. She is in Edhelion, and craves a taste of wine from her own home. Dorwinion White, if my sources are correct.

'Sogadan in Rivendell is the fellow that sells it. He is a vintner there. Make sure you buy the white, not the red!'
Dorwinion White can be found in Rivendell, sold by the vintner Sogadan.\n\nYou should travel to Rivendell to purchase Lendasil's request of Dorwinion White wine.

'Greetings to you. I see that you are a member of the halflings' \qInn League\q as well. Some find them a frivolous people, but it is good to find some pleasures in this Middle-earth, especially when confronted with ruins such as these.

'Soon I will leave Middle-earth behind, and yet I have decided to complete their Inn League's Challenge. It affords me a wonderful opportunity to taste all that will be lost to me when I leave these lands behind. Yet it seems I have neglected to drink one of the finest wines in Middle-earth: Dorwinion White. Sadly, beyond journeying to Dorwinion itself, this can only be found in Rivendell.

'Would you obtain this wine for me? I fear I cannot leave my contemplation at Edhelion. Sogadan, the vintner, is a friend of mine and will likely have what I desire.'

Lendasil is in the ruins of Edhelion about Thorin's Hall in Ered Luin, far to the west of the Trollshaws.\n\nLendasil has asked you to collect a glass of Dorwinion White for her from the vintner Sogadan in the Rivendell. Once you have the wine, bring it back to her at Refuge of Edhelion.
'You'd best hurry over to Rivendell to collect that wine. Dorwinion White is the ticket. Not red!'

'Ah, you have brought the wine. What a lovely colour...truly a great wine. Perhaps there are superior wines in the West...but sometimes I wonder if that is true.\n\n'It is true that the wines in the West are made in lands free of the long taint of evil that Middle-earth has had to suffer. Yet the wines made here must overcome that taint, and I think that makes vintages like the Dorwinion White all the better for it.'
'Dorwinion White reminds me of the Falls of Imladris, clear as water. It is a perfect wine.'

'The vintner Sogadan in Rivendell should have the Dorwinion White. I would be most grateful if you could obtain it for me. I fear I have not the time to return to Rivendell before the ship carrying me west leaves.'
Bring the Dorwinion White to Lendasil
Return with the Dorwinion White before time expires!
